title: Can I write a research paper in two days? - Quora

response.answer_text: That’s a very broad question so I’ll answer it by considering the various questions that need to be answered for me to give you a good answer: Are you intending to get this published in a journal or is it a school project?Does your paper involve studying something (i.e. people)?What subject is your paper in (i.e. quantum mechanics or comparative literature)?What’s the projected length of the research paper?Generally speaking, unless you’re writing a short (< 5 pages) research paper for a course, the answer will be no. Keep in mind that writing a research paper is quite different than writing a normal document/assignment since you’ll often have to do literature review, sources, come up with a thesis, etc.
If you work contiously for 12 hours … you can complete with in two days… first keep all results in one file and then start…
Of course you can, but will it be good?
If you are a good writer. Fifteen minutes.
